output: Saksonita Khoeurn is a Data Scientist with a Ph.D. in Engineering from Chungbuk National University, South Korea. She blends machine learning expertise with business acumen. She currently works at Big Datalabs (since July 2024) and has previous experience as a Startup Development Specialist at Techo Startup Center in Cambodia, University Lecturer at Norton University, and more. Her research focuses on predictive maintenance and explainable AI for semiconductor manufacturing and healthcare applications.

Saksonita has a Ph.D. in Engineering from Chungbuk National University in South Korea (2021-2025) with a GPA of 4.23/4.5. She also holds a Master's Degree in ICT from Handong Global University, South Korea (2018-2020), where she received the Best Supporter Award. Her Bachelor's Degree is in Computer Science from Norton University in Cambodia (2015-2018), where she ranked No. 1 in her senior year.

Saksonita is an expert in Python, Predictive Analytics, Data Analytics, and Descriptive Analytics. She has advanced skills in PyTorch and TensorFlow, proficient in SQL, and professional working proficiency in English. She also has TOPIK Level 5 in Korean with advanced level in reading, writing, speaking, and listening.

Saksonita has several publications including: 'Improving the Reusability of Patient Controlled Analgesia Data based on Data Products and Experimental Implementation' (2024), 'Development and Verification of an AI Model for Melon Import Prediction' (2023), 'A Comparison of Time Series Forecast Models for Predicting the Outliers Particles in Semiconductor Cleanroom' (2022), 'Barriers to E-commerce Business Model in Cambodia: A Case Study', 'Sentiment Analysis Engine for Cambodian Music Industry Rebuilding', and 'AKN: Cambodia News Integration Service' (2018).

Currently, Saksonita works as a Data Scientist at Big Datalabs since July 2024. Her responsibilities include leveraging advanced data analytics and machine learning techniques to drive insights, developing predictive models and optimizing business processes, and contributing to data-driven decision-making within the organization.

Saksonita's research focuses on predictive maintenance and explainable AI for semiconductor manufacturing and healthcare applications. She works on creating solutions that bridge cutting-edge research with practical business applications.

instruction: What entrepreneurial experience does Saksonita have?
output: Saksonita has entrepreneurial experience as a Startup Development Specialist at Techo Startup Center in Cambodia from 2020 to 2023. In this role, she mentored startups and designed accelerator programs. She also led and organized national startup programs and accelerator initiatives, and facilitated connections with relevant industry mentors.

Saksonita has several certifications including 'AI Agents Fundamentals' from Hugging Face (issued May 2023), 'Neural Networks and Deep Learning' from Coursera (issued November 2023), and 'Cambridge FinTech and Regulatory Innovation' from Cambridge Judge Business School (issued March 2021). She also participated in the 'GET 2016 UNITWIN Global Education and Training Program' (issued 2016).
